title: A New Cold War? - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 3/30/21
itunes:title: A New Cold War? - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 3/30/21
description:
George Noory, author Nick Begich and an open lines caller discuss how the United States, China and Russia are all competing to develop new technology to gain an advantage in exploring the North Pole.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
